name: One Night At Mario's
description:
You go to work at Mario's Pizzeria but something's wrong.

Supposed to be shut down Mario and his rival, Wario are rushing at you

You must protect yourself from the dangers of these haunted costumes.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

DEVELOPER NOTES.

Made For The Beginner Game Jam. 

Made this game for the game jam and is honestly a rushed game based off Five Nights At Freddy's. This game is a remix from some guy on scratch named pvz_pro. I just wanted to be inside a game jam for my life. And honestly have no intentions  on winning and if it does thanks and expect more from me.

Thanks for the insiration Zed_technician. 

nice games...
